name: Global Public Inclusive Infrastructure
tagline: Code Repositories for the GPII Organization
body:
### Welcome to the GPII

This Github project organization contains numerous code repositories for ongoing work in the GPII.  For more information on the project, please see this [page](http://gpii.net) and feel free to subscribe and participate in our [mailing lists](http://wiki.gpii.net/w/Mailing_Lists).

Core Project Repositories
* [universal](https://github.com/GPII/universal)
* [linux](https://github.com/GPII/linux)
* [windows](https://github.com/GPII/windows)
* [grunt-gpii](https://github.com/GPII/grunt-gpii)
* [prefsEditors](https://github.com/GPII/prefsEditors)
* [mac](https://github.com/GPII/mac)
* [android](https://github.com/GPII/android)

In addition to the above formally governed repositories this organization contains other projects maintained separately by other teams on the project.  More information on our release and commit organization is available [here](http://wiki.gpii.net/w/GPII_Technical_Governance).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
